original_text: The whole group of believers met together every day in the yard of the temple. They shared their food and they ate meals together in each other's homes. They were very happy and they were honest with each other.
korean_text: 날마다 마음을 같이하여 성전에 모이기를 힘쓰고 집에서 떡을 떼며 기쁨과 순전한 마음으로 음식을 먹고

sentences.original_text: The whole group of believers met together every day
sentences.korean_translation: 믿는 사람 전체가 매일 함께 모였습니다

sentences.original_text: in the yard of the temple
and they were honest with each other
